lines.text: Limbo is like New Jersey. You can see all the good stuff, you just have to get there.
I saw the horizon. It's out there. And though I may not ever be able to touch it, it's worth reaching for.
Who are we kidding? I'm blind. I can't see see. I don't belong here. I'm not meant to see.
You're darn right you're blind. I'm standing right here for you and you don't even look.
Great. I'm blind and you're deaf. What a perfect pair.
Maybe I'm not meant to see.
She smelled like cinnamon and nutmeg.
